comment: multi-step reaction (similar to R10671, R00730+R04460+R07190) general reaction (see R08160, R08652, R08665, R08670, R08672, R08673, R08674 and R08675)
definition: Amino acid + 2 Oxygen + 2 NADPH + 2 H+ <=> Aldoxime + 2 NADP+ + 3 H2O + CO2
name: amino-acid,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating, decarboxylating)
